explanation: [0-0] A young woman in a brown top stands by the stove in the kitchen, on which sits a round, black iron plate. Next to it is a large stainless steel pot and a black mobile phone standing beside it. The woman looks down at the phone screen, her hands placed on a white plate on the countertop, on which lies a round flatbread. Above the adjacent countertop hangs a metal rack with many kitchen utensils. On the upper left shelf are also some bowls and other kitchenware.

[0-3] Then the woman, while looking at the phone screen, flips the flatbread over in her hands and places it on the iron plate above the stove. At the same time, a middle-aged woman in a blue dress walks into the kitchen from the left and stands to the left of the young woman in brown. She lifts her left hand to open the upper cabinet, her right hand resting on the kitchen countertop.
